name: MakeChai
0:
”Alexa, open Make Chai”
”Alexa, start Make Chai”
”Alexa, launch Make Chai”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: make chai
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Let Alexa help you make many flavours of chai.
Alexa can now help you step by step to make many flavours of Chai. Once you choose your desired flavour, Alexa will read the full ingredients list and will repeat it again one by one, so that you can gather the ingredients. Once you are ready with the ingredients Alexa will take you through the preparation steps one by one. 


At any step, You can say "next" or "done" to move forward to the next step — If you need more time with a step, you can ask Alexa to "hold on" — Also, you can ask to "repeat" or "go back" a step — During the beginning of a session, you can ask for the "flavors menu" to know all the available flavors.

Hope you will have a good time making chai.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
